languages.text: "Или предки пожелали избавить тебя от них. Когда ты пришла, я видел в твоей душе темные пятна, затмевающие ее сияние. Но теперь... Душа твоя кристально чиста".
"Or your ancestors decided to relieve you of them. When you first came, I saw dark spots in your soul, diminishing its glow. But now... now your soul is crystal clear."
languages.original_text: "Или предки пожелали избавить тебя от них. Когда ты пришла, я видел в твоей душе темные пятна, затмевающие ее сияние. Но теперь... Душа твоя кристально чиста".

traits.locale_text: "Or your ancestors decided to relieve you of them. When you first came, I have seen the dark spots in your soul, diminishing its' glow. But now... Your soul is crystal clear."
"Or your ancestors decided to relieve you of them. When you first came, I have seen the dark spots in your soul, diminishing its' glow. But now... Your soul is crystal clear."
"Or your ancestors decided to relieve you of them. When you first came, I saw dark spots in your soul, diminishing its glow. But now... now your soul is crystal clear."
"Or your ancestors decided to relieve you of them. When you first came, I saw dark spots in your soul, diminishing its glow. But now... now your soul is crystal clear."
"Or your ancestors decided to relieve you of them. When you first came, I saw dark spots in your soul, diminishing its glow. But now... now your soul is crystal clear."

languages.text: “也可能是先祖替你清除了这些记忆。你第一次来到这里的时候，我看到你灵魂中的污点遮盖了它原本的光芒，可现在，你的灵魂再次像水晶一样清澈剔透。”
languages.original_text: "Or your ancestors decided to relieve you of them. When you first came, I saw dark spots in your soul, diminishing its glow. But now... now your soul is crystal clear."

traits.locale_text: “也可能是先祖替你清除了这些记忆。你第一次来到这里的时候，我看到你灵魂中的污点遮盖了它原本的光芒，可现在，你的灵魂再次像水晶一样清澈剔透。”

languages.text: «O tus ancestros decidieron librarte de ellos. La primera vez que viniste, advertí unas manchas oscuras en tu alma que atenuaban su resplandor. Pero ahora... ahora tu alma es cristalina».
languages.original_text: "Or your ancestors decided to relieve you of them. When you first came, I saw dark spots in your soul, diminishing its glow. But now... now your soul is crystal clear."

traits.locale_text: «O tus ancestros decidieron librarte de ellos. La primera vez que viniste, advertí unas manchas oscuras en tu alma que atenuaban su resplandor. Pero ahora... ahora tu alma es cristalina».

languages.text: « Ou vos ancêtres ont décidé de vous libérer d'eux. Quand vous êtes arrivée, j'ai vu des taches sombres dans votre âme qui obscurcissaient son aura, mais maintenant... votre âme est cristalline. »
languages.original_text: "Or your ancestors decided to relieve you of them. When you first came, I saw dark spots in your soul, diminishing its glow. But now... now your soul is crystal clear."

traits.locale_text: « Ou vos ancêtres ont décidé de vous libérer d'eux. Quand vous êtes arrivée, j'ai vu des taches sombres dans votre âme qui obscurcissaient son aura, mais maintenant... votre âme est cristalline. »

languages.text: "Oder Eure Ahnen haben beschlossen, Euch davon zu befreien. Als Ihr herkamt, sah ich dunkle Flecken in Eurer Seele, die ihr Leuchten minderten. Aber jetzt ... jetzt ist Eure Seele kristallklar."
languages.original_text: "Or your ancestors decided to relieve you of them. When you first came, I saw dark spots in your soul, diminishing its glow. But now... now your soul is crystal clear."

traits.locale_text: "Oder Eure Ahnen haben beschlossen, Euch davon zu befreien. Als Ihr herkamt, sah ich dunkle Flecken in Eurer Seele, die ihr Leuchten minderten. Aber jetzt ... jetzt ist Eure Seele kristallklar."

languages.text: 「あるいは、あなたの父祖が、あなたをそれらから解放しようと決めたか。最初に来たとき、私はあなたの魂に暗い斑点があり、その輝きを弱めているのを見た。しかし今は、あなたの魂は透き通っている」
languages.original_text: "Or your ancestors decided to relieve you of them. When you first came, I saw dark spots in your soul, diminishing its glow. But now... now your soul is crystal clear."

traits.locale_text: 「あるいは、あなたの父祖が、あなたをそれらから解放しようと決めたか。最初に来たとき、私はあなたの魂に暗い斑点があり、その輝きを弱めているのを見た。しかし今は、あなたの魂は透き通っている」

languages.text: "Ya da ataların seni onlardan kurtardı. Buraya ilk geldiğinde ruhunda onun ışığını gölgeleyen kara lekeler gördüm. Fakat şimdi... Şimdi ruhun tertemiz."
languages.original_text: "Or your ancestors decided to relieve you of them. When you first came, I saw dark spots in your soul, diminishing its glow. But now... now your soul is crystal clear."

traits.locale_text: "Ya da ataların seni onlardan kurtardı. Buraya ilk geldiğinde ruhunda onun ışığını gölgeleyen kara lekeler gördüm. Fakat şimdi... Şimdi ruhun tertemiz."
